xxl.core.xml.storage
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.xml.storage.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LiteralNode, MarkupNode, ProxyNode, ScaffoldNode
public abstract class Node
extends Object
implements Cloneable

The super class of all nodes of the EXTree.

Node

Method Detail

getNodeByType

public static Node getNodeByType(byte type)
Chooses the node-constructor by the given type and returns a empty node with this type. If i.e. type==Node.MARKUP_NODE, a MarkupNode will be returned.

getSubtreeConverter

public static SubtreeConverter getSubtreeConverter(FixedSizeConverter idConverter)
Returns a subtree converter for a given id converter.

Parameters:
idConverter - converter which converts the ids inside the subtree.
Returns:
SizeConverter converter for the subtree.

subtreeToRecord

public static Block subtreeToRecord(short maxInternalId,
                                    Node root,
                                    SizeConverter subtreeConverter)
Returns a record that contains the whole subtree determined by the given root-node.

Parameters:
root - the root-node of the subtree that should be serialized into the record
Returns:
a record that contains the whole subtree where this is the root-node.

replaceProxyByNode

protected boolean replaceProxyByNode(Object oldId,
                                     Node node)
Replaces the proxy that points to the record with oldId by the given node. Return true if the replacement was usccesfull, false otherwise. Under the assumption that there can exist at most one proxy node which points to the record with the old id, the algorithm can stop when one proxy has been overwritten by the node.

Parameters:
oldId - Id which is searched
node - Replaces the ProxyNode with oldId.

containsProxyId

protected boolean containsProxyId(Object id)
Return true if the tree (just the subtree in one record) given by root contains a proxy that leads to the record with the identifyer id. Else otherwise.

Parameters:
id - the identifyer
Returns:
true if such a ProxyNode is found.

removeProxy

protected boolean removeProxy(Object oldId)
Removes the Proxy in the subtree beginning by root. Under the assumption that there can exist at most one proxy node which points to the record with the old id, the algorithm can stop when one proxy has been overwritten by the node.

Returns:
true if the removing was successfull, false otherwise

getNumberOfChildren

public int getNumberOfChildren()
Return the number of child nodes. Calls getChildList().size().

Returns:
the number of child nodes.

toXML

public void toXML(Object id,
                  PrintStream out,
                  boolean outputProxies,
                  Function getProxySubtrees)
Prints the subtree as XML to the PrintStream. This method can write the complete EXTree tree, beginning at root, to the PrintStream.

Parameters:
id - identifyer for this subtree (if you don't want one, use the empty String "")
out - PrintStream
outputProxies - Outputting the proxy and scaffolding nodes?
getProxySubtrees - Function which returns subtrees if the id is given. If the function is null, then only the current subtree is transformed into XML.

justSubtreeToXML

public void justSubtreeToXML(Object id,
                             PrintStream out,
                             boolean outputProxies)
Writes just the subtree to the PrintStream. That is usefull to analyze i.e. the separator tree in the case of a split.

Parameters:
id - the id of the subtree, that contains the given node.
out - the PrintStream

justSubtreeToXML

public void justSubtreeToXML(Object id,
                             OutputStream out)
Writes just the subtree to the OutputStream. That is usefull to analyze i.e. the separator tree in the case of a split.

Parameters:
id - the id of the subtree, that contains the given node.
out - the OutputStream

clone

public Object clone()
             throws CloneNotSupportedException
Makes a deep copy of the Node (subtree). The internalParentId is set to -1 (must be set by the father node).

Overrides:
clone in class Object
Throws:
CloneNotSupportedException
